title: A walk through the city's new Innovation Trail
dc:creator: WBUR
description: We get an inside look at the city's new Innovation Trail, which celebrates the history of innovation in Boston and Cambridge. We talk with Scott Kirsner, Boston Globe contributor and co-designer of the trail and the Broad Institute's Namrata Sengupta.
